description: The Client that provides a simple and convenient way to interact with InfluxDB 3.

scripts.typedoc:gh-pages: yarn typedoc && gh-pages -d ./docs -m 'docs: updates documentation [skip CI]'
scripts.clean: rimraf temp docs && yarn workspaces run clean
scripts.test: yarn --cwd packages/client build && yarn workspaces run test
scripts.coverage: cd packages/client && yarn build && yarn coverage
scripts.coverage:ci: cd packages/client && yarn build && yarn coverage:ci
